txt.en: Talk to the Huorn to dismiss him
Talk to the old man who has been watching you
The Huorn has asked to follow you
The Huorn from Wisewood's grove has seen your heroic efforts and is determined to help you as you continue.

This Huorn bristles with eagerness as you approach. You did not notice it at first, but it has been watching as you stamped out Orc-fires and slew the Orcs who began the burning of the forest.\n\nHe wishes to join you as you continue punishing the Orcs.
The Huorn is near the Orc-camp on the north-east edge of Fangorn's eaves.
The Huorn wishes to follow you. You should call it to your side now.

This admiring Huorn wishes to help you deal with the dense population of Orcs in the White Hand encampment.\n\nYou should complete a number of tasks in the encampment, using the whistle to call your tree-friend for help if you become separated.
The Huorn follows you as you venture throughout the White Hand encampment. You can use your whistle to summon it if you become separated.\n\nYou should speak with the Huorn.
'Well met, [placeholder]. It is always good to see a friendly face in the wild places of the world.'
A strange old man in rags hails you from north of the White Hand encampment.\n\nYou should speak with this stranger....
The Huorn is pleased to have assisted you in your revenge upon the vicious Orcs who invade Fangorn.\n\nYou release the Huorn, and it is a happier tree than it was before your chance encounter.
Use the whistle to summon your new friend if you become separated
